thread.title: Chase Away Winter Blues With Special Weekend Package From Five Orlando Marriott Hotels
thread.title_full: Chase Away Winter Blues With Special Weekend Package From Five Orlando Marriott Hotels - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Chase Away Winter Blues With Special Weekend Package From Five Orlando Marriott Hotels
text:
Marriott Hotels
Marriott hotels in Orlando offer Weekend Wintervention Package with 20% off of a stay plus a $25 resort credit
ORLANDO, Fla. , Sept. 9, Cool weather may be coming, but the fun is just heating up with the Weekend Wintervention Package from select Marriott hotels in Orlando .
Orlando's average temperature sitting at 78 degrees, there's never been a better reason to escape to The Sunshine State. And if the beautiful weather is not enough to ditch those winter coats and hats, some special savings will be. Travelers who take advantage of the Weekend Wintervention Package now through March 31, 2016 , will enjoy 20 percent off of their stay and receive a $25 resort credit when booking at JW Marriott Orlando, Grande Lakes , Renaissance Orlando at SeaWorld® , Orlando World Center Marriott , Orlando Airport Marriott Lakeside and Gaylord Palms Resort & Convention Center .
Whether spurring a romantic getaway for two, escaping with friends for a last-minute retreat or bringing the whole family together for a winter break, travelers will never experience a shortage of fun in the sun while staying at Marriott's premier luxury and kid-friendly hotels in Orlando . Make memories while splashing in sparkling outdoor pools surrounded by swaying palms and lavish lounge chairs. Tempt taste buds with mouthwatering meals from an array of on-site restaurants, and retreat to relaxation in stylishly appointed accommodations, complete with modern furnishings, luxurious bedding and beautiful balconies.
Golf lovers looking to hit the greens during their getaway can tee off on a championship golf course right on site at JW Marriott Orlando, Grande Lakes and Orlando World Center Marriott. Featuring picturesque grounds surrounded by beautiful trees and watering holes, these lavish Orlando resorts are the perfect place to master a swing and avoid the winter snow.
For a more relaxing activity, visitors of Renaissance Orlando at SeaWorld®, Gaylord Palms Resort & Convention Center, Orlando World Center Marriott and JW Marriott Orlando, Grande Lakes can pamper themselves at full-service spas. With a variety of treatments for the mind, body and spirit, the on-site spas will quickly get guests into a tropical vacation state of mind.
Families looking to fuel the fun off site will find their Orlando hotel in the perfect location. With exciting attractions including Walt Disney World®, SeaWorld®, LEGOLAND®, Aquatica™, Universal Studios® and The Mall at Millenia just minutes away, making memories this winter will never be easier.
To take advantage of the special Weekend Wintervention Package, guests must book a two-night minimum stay that includes a Friday or Saturday night. Reserve rooms by calling 1-800-327-6677 and mentioning promotional code P91.
About JW Marriott Orlando, Grande Lakes
JW Marriott Orlando, Grande Lakes at 4040 Central Florida Parkway in Orlando, FL is minutes from Walt Disney World®, SeaWorld® and The Mall at Millenia. The resort features 26 floors with 934 rooms, 64 suites, 48 meetings rooms with 100,800 square feet of event space, 8 restaurants, a full-service spa, fitness center, championship golf course, outdoor pool and lazy river. Resort guests will enjoy a complimentary shuttle service to Walt Disney World®, SeaWorld® Orlando and Universal Orlando®. For information, visit www.marriott.com/MCOJW or call 1-407-206-2300.
About Renaissance Orlando at SeaWorld®
Renaissance Orlando at SeaWorld® at 6677 Sea Harbor Drive in Orlando, FL is minutes from LEGOLAND®, Aquatica™ and Universal Studios®. The hotel features 10 floors with 716 rooms, 65 suites, 76 meeting rooms with 185,000 square feet of space, 6 restaurants, an outdoor pool, children's waterpark, full-service spa and fitness center. As an official SeaWorld Partner Hotel, guests will receive exclusive benefits including front-of-the-line access and merchandise discounts at the theme park. For information, visit www.marriott.com/MCOSR or call 1-407-351-5555.
About Orlando World Center Marriott
Orlando World Center Marriott at 8701 World Center Drive in Orlando, FL is minutes from Walt Disney World®, SeaWorld® Orlando , Discovery Cove®, Aquatica™, LEGOLAND® and Universal Studios® Orlando . The resort features 28 floors, 1,883 guest rooms, 121 suites, 92 meeting rooms with 450,000 square feet of total space, 10 restaurants and lounges, a full-service spa and fitness center, a championship golf course and the iconic Falls Pool Oasis. For information, visit www.WorldCenterMarriott.com or call 1-800-380-7931.
About Orlando Airport Marriott Lakeside
Orlando Airport Marriott Lakeside at 7499 Augusta National Drive in Orlando, FL is a mile from Orlando International Airport (MCO) and offers a free shuttle. The hotel near Walt Disney World, SeaWorld® Orlando and Amway Arena boasts 9 floors with 471 rooms and 14 suites, 20 meeting rooms with 29,700 square feet of flexible event space, 1 concierge level, Crimson Tide restaurant, indoor and outdoor pools and a fitness center. For information, visit www.marriott.com/MCOAP or call 1-407-851-9000.
About Gaylord Palms Resort & Convention Center
Gaylord Palms Resort & Convention Center at 6000 W. Osceola in Orlando, FL is near Epcot®, Disney® and Hollywood Studios®. The hotel features 9 floors, 1,291 rooms, 115 suites, 103 meeting rooms with 400,000 square feet of event space, 8 restaurants, a full-service spa, outdoor pool, water park and fitness center. For information, visit www.marriott.com/MCOGP or call 1-407-586-0000.
Join Marriott Rewards now and earn points that can be redeemed for free hotel stays and room upgrades at 3,800 hotels in over 70 countries.
